objects.text:
Includes 2 Cute Cat Figures
Spinning Palm Tree & Hammock
Complete with Food & Toys
Perfect for Barbie Adventures

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This banner has a playful and colorful design, tailored to promote a children's toy product. It features a large, bold headline ("heading") in red, followed by a smaller but vibrant subheading ("subheading") in deep blue. A pink decorative line ("decorative") separates the header from a product description section ("description") written in a clean, modern typeface. The focal point is a high-quality product image ("product_image") centered on the right half of the banner. A bright red price tag ("price") catches attention at the bottom, alongside a CTA button ("cta") with white text on a red background ("cta_background"). The background consists of a soft lavender tone with circular and wavy vector embellishments in pink, giving a whimsical and friendly touch.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Lavender: `#F5E6F2`
- Hot Pink: `#FF69B4`
- Bold Red: `#d2010d`
- Deep Blue: `#1a0dab`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Soft Green: `#77DD77`
- Light Purple: `#B19CD9`
- Baby Pink: `#FFB6C1`
- Neutral Gray: `#333333`
product_color: The product image uses a playful and vibrant color palette to appeal to a younger audience, combining soft pastels with bright tropical tones. Dominant colors include bright pink (#F75DA6) for the upper structure, mint green (#45C4A0) for the grass platform, and beige sand (#F4CDA0) for the base. Additional accents include lavender purple (#C89BD3) for details, sky blue (#60C8D2) for the hammock, and a deep green (#218C5A) for palm fronds. These colors contrast yet harmoniously blend through repetition and placement, with each hue enhancing and highlighting the playful theme. They evoke joy, creativity, and a sense of paradise, perfect for a children's product ad.
